intro: Get Hooked on Rhythm!! Jump into a musical world on a roller coaster of sound and light!
description:
■An Overwhelming Fusion of Music and Visuals
Groove Coaster is a rhythm game where you play along while racing down tracks that twist and turn to the music.

With dynamic sound and light effects, you’ll feel completely immersed—as if you’ve stepped into a world of music and are performing right inside it!

■Enhanced Visuals
For the first time in the series, the gameplay screen features a full horizontal layout, letting the world of music fill your entire view!

Visual expression has been greatly improved, and some songs even include scenes using the original music videos!

■Two Play Styles to Choose From
You can select from two different play styles to match your skill level!
Basic: Enjoy the game casually with four types of notes—perfect for beginners.
Advanced: Challenge yourself with nine types of notes—ideal for rhythm game veterans and fans of the classic series who want a deeper, more rewarding experience!

■Fully Voiced "Story Mode" Featuring a Star-Studded Cast
For the first time in the series, enjoy a luxurious, fully voiced Story Mode!

Centered around two protagonists, Sendou Kakeru and Himekawa Aria, a rich cast of characters—including classmates, teachers, and rivals from other schools—join the story.

The journey begins as they aim for victory in the "Groove Coaster" tournament, a futuristic sport where players perform while racing along the tracks...

Main Characters
- Sendou Kakeru(Voice: Kawashima Reiji/ Theme Song Artist: Somari)
- Himekawa Aria(Voice: Sakura Ayane/ Theme Song Artist: 40mP)
- Fwuff (Voice: Shirakami Fubuki / Theme Song Artist: NayutalieN)
- Sharsha (Voice: Sakura Miko / Theme Song Artist: Satsuki & Karasuyasabou)

■Includes Many Popular Songs from Anime, Vocaloid, and More!
In addition to original tracks, the game features a wide variety of popular songs from various genres!
- Idol / YOASOBI
- Bling-Bang-Bang-Born / Creepy Nuts
- Hai Yorokonde / Kocchi no Kento
- BOW AND ARROW / Yonezu Kenshi
- Demons Banquet / Tomonari Sora
- Good-Bye Declaration / Chinozo
- KING / Kanaria
- Mesmerizer / Satsuki
- God-ish / PinocchioP
- Lagtrain / inabakumori
- Override / Yoshida Yasei
- Bibbidiba / Hoshimachi Suisei
- Catcher in the Ui / Shigure Ui
- Heart Pie Dancehall / HIMEHINA
…and a total of 50 songs included!

Now, let’s ride the groove of the future!
